NCCP

Rendezvous Canada Results
Sept 26-27, 2008
Montreal, Quebec


1st 44kg Jordan Poliakiwski (2W-0L)

Report: Jordan Poliakiwski had a good day winning her first match of the day against a tall strong left handed American opponent with sankaku-jime for ippon. In the second match Jordan controlled the gripping situations and threw her Mexican opponent with a tia-o-toshi for wazari and then followed up with a pin for ippon.

Ian McDonald lost his opening match and was not pulled into competition and Debrah McKay lost her two matches but both athletes showed a positive spirit that will being better performance in future competitions.
